meanings.sent1: I poured applesauce over my pancakes.
meanings.sent2: The applesauce was sweet and tangy.
meanings.sent3: Grandma's secret applesauce recipe always brings a smile.
meanings.sent4: The applesauce of kindness can make any day brighter.
meanings.sent5: The warm applesauce melted in my mouth like a sweet hug.

meanings.sent1: Don't listen to his applesauce, it's all made up.
meanings.sent2: The teacher ignored the student's applesauce during class.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's applesauce had the audience laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent4: Her excuses were just applesauce, trying to avoid responsibility.
meanings.sent5: His applesauce was like a silly song that never ends.
